attributes.action: Accept the appology of the American people for our president's Actions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people of America value your friendship, and long standing commitment as our best ally.

The people here in America DO NOT appreciate how the President treated you on your visit to Washington, and we want you and the people of Britian to know that we love Britain, and her people.

Chris Hood
Columbus, Ga USA

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
